text: "An Easier Affair" is a 2006 song by George Michael. This is the leading single from his second greatest hits album Twenty Five. It topped the single charts in Hungary and Italy and also went to the top 40 in Australia, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, the Netherlands, Scotland, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== CD single and digital single # "An Easier Affair" – 4:36 # "Brother, Can You Spare a Dime?"
